sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-responsive class="mx-auto" max-width="350">
          <v-card
            style="
              backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
              background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
              box-shadow: 0px 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
              border-radius: 10px;
            "
            :loading="requestLoading"
            class="pa-4 mt-4 mx-auto"
            title="User Registration"
            variant="outlined"
          >
            <v-form @submit.prevent>
              <v-text-field
                hide-details="auto"
                label="Username"
                placeholder="Linus"
                prepend-icon="mdi-account"
                variant="underlined"
                v-model="nemo"
                counter="20"
                validate-on="submit"
                :rules="[rules.required, rules.maxLength]"
              ></v-text-field>
              <v-text-field
                hide-details="auto"
                label="Password"
                placeholder="qwerty"
                prepend-icon="mdi-lock"
                variant="underlined"
                v-model="credentials.password"
                :type="showPassword ? 'text' : 'password'"
              >
                <template v-slot:append>
                  <v-icon
                    :icon="showPassword ? 'mdi-eye' : 'mdi-eye-off'"
                    @click="showPassword = !showPassword"
                  ></v-icon>
                </template>
              </v-text-field>
              <v-card color="surface-variant" variant="tonal" class="mt-6">
                <v-card-text class="text-medium-emphasis text-caption">
                  Warning: If you are already registered in this site, it will
                  automatically log-in you. Username rules: no whitespace, name
                  must contain lower than 20 characters, numbers or symbols! *
                  If you tick the checkbox remember me and input your email we
                  can restore your account when you forgot password.It is highly
                  recommendet!
                </v-card-text>
              </v-card>
              <v-btn
                @click="register"
                color="success"
                class="mt-4"
                size="large"
                type="submit"
                block
              >
                sign-in
              </v-btn>
            </v-form>
          </v-card>
        </v-responsive>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: "RegisterView",
  data() {
    return {
      nemo: "",
      emailEnabled: false,
      showPassword: false,
      requestLoading: false,
      credentials: {
        username: null,
        password: null,
      },
      isValid: true,
      rules: {
        required: (value) => !!value || "Please, fill the field!",
        maxLength: (value) =>
          value.length <= 20 || "Your username must contain max 20 characters!",
        minLength: (value) =>
          value.length >= 4 ||
          "Your username must contain at least 4 characters!",
      },
    };
  },
  methods: {
    register() {
      alert(90);
      this.requestLoading = !this.requestLoading;
      axios
        .post("http://192.168.1.110:8000/users/register/", {
          username: this.credentials.username,
          password: this.credentials.password,
        })
        .then((response) => {
          if (response.status == 201) {
            this.requestLoading = !this.requestLoading;
          }
        });
    },
  },
  watch: {
    nemo(newValue) {
      alert(newValue)
    },
  },
};
</script>
